content:
MultiShardExecutionOptions Enum

Definition

Defines the available options when executing commands against multiple shards

In this Article

[System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessage("Microsoft.Naming", "CA1704:IdentifiersShouldBeSpelledCorrectly", MessageId="Multi")]
[System.Flags]
public enum MultiShardExecutionOptions
Inheritance
Enum
MultiShardExecutionOptions
Attributes
System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessage System.Flags

Remarks

This enumeration has a flags attribute

Fields

IncludeShardNameColumn

Whether the $ShardName pseudo column should be included in the result-sets.
None

, Execute without any options enabled
